#summary Mail Window

=Mail Window=

Potato provides a graphical Mail Window, where you can compose in-game mail without taking up an input window. The mail window knows about a number of common MU`*` mail system formats, including:

  * *MUSH @mail* - @mail %to%=%subject%/%body%
  * *MUX @mail* - @mail %to%=%subject% ;; -%body% ;; --
  * *Multi-Command +mail* - +mail %to%=%subject% ;; -%body% ;; --
  * *MUSE +mail* - +mail %to%=%body%
  * *Myrddin's BB System* - +bbpost %to%/%subject%=%body%
  
You can also use a Custom mail format. The following keywords are replaced automatically with fields from the mail window:

  * %to%
  * %cc%
  * %bcc*
  * %subject*
  * %body%
  
The string ";;" (two semi-colons) separates commands.
